attributes.action:
Ending the clock change.
Keep to British Summer Time all year round.
attributes.additional_details:
The number of road casualties rises, with the effects being worse for the most vulnerable road users like children, older people, cyclists and motorcyclists.
In 2019, pedestrian deaths rose from 33 in September and 36 in October, to 54 in November and 57 in December. This is a trend we see every year.
attributes.background: Every autumn when the clocks go back and sunset suddenly occurs earlier in the day, there are a host of negative impacts on the way we live our lives.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597436
